title: Pem 2's references to victories and use of troops

content.question: In Poem 2, the reference to Indian victories on battlefields is best understood in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: Violent resistance by Indians to colonial rule
The drafting of migrants into the militaries of host countries
The mobilization of Indian troops to fight in Great Britain’s wars

content.answer: The mobilization of Indian troops to fight in Great Britain’s wars

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
